page_content: The page discusses the ICT services provided for vocational schools in the Canton of Thurgau, including software offerings and e-learning platforms.
The page provides information on educational offerings and resources available for schools at the Museum for Archaeology in Thurgau.
The page offers a PDF download for a short guide related to tax regulations for the year 2017.
The page provides templates and instructions for parliamentary initiatives to be submitted to the Cantonal Parliament of Thurgau.
The page discusses the replacement of the current School Administration System (SVS) used in Thurgau and outlines the project's objectives and current status.
The page offers a PDF download for a guide related to tax forms 17, 17a, and 17b for the year 2011.
The page provides information on the vocational training program for metal construction practitioners, including educational requirements and course content.
